performance_metrics.name: Production Rate (Loaf/Hour)
performance_metrics.description: The number of standard loaves produced per hour. This is heavily influenced by batch size and equipment speed.

performance_metrics.name: Dough Development Time (Minutes)
performance_metrics.description: Time from initial dough mixing to dough achieving optimal gluten development. Critical for final loaf texture.

performance_metrics.name: Proofing Time (Minutes)
performance_metrics.description: Time for the dough to rise, influenced by temperature and humidity. Affects final volume and crumb structure.

performance_metrics.name: Crumb Volume (cc/Loaf)
performance_metrics.description: Volume of the air space within the loaf, directly impacting texture and eating quality. Dependent on fermentation and shaping.

performance_metrics.name: Crumb Tenderness (Shore Hardness)
performance_metrics.description: A measure of the loaf's resistance to being compressed. Indicates softness and overall texture. Measured using a Shore A durometer.

performance_metrics.name: Moisture Content (%)
performance_metrics.description: The overall moisture content of the finished bread.  Affects shelf life and texture. Measured using a moisture analyzer.

performance_metrics.name: Shelf Life (Days)
performance_metrics.description: The period during which the bread remains acceptable in terms of texture and flavor, stored under optimal conditions.

implementation_requirements.name: Dough Mixer Capacity
implementation_requirements.description: The capacity of the dough mixer, influencing batch size and overall production rate.

implementation_requirements.name: Proofing Cabinet Temperature
implementation_requirements.description: Precise temperature control is vital for consistent dough development.

implementation_requirements.name: Proofing Cabinet Humidity
implementation_requirements.description: Maintaining appropriate humidity is critical for proper yeast activity.

implementation_requirements.name: Shaping Machine
implementation_requirements.specification: Automated, capable of 10-15 cycles per minute
implementation_requirements.description: Automated shaping reduces labor costs and ensures consistent loaf shape.

implementation_requirements.name: Deck Oven Temperature Profile
implementation_requirements.description: Precise temperature control during baking is essential for crust color and crumb structure.

implementation_requirements.name: Cooling Conveyor
implementation_requirements.description: Controlled cooling minimizes starch retrogradation and maintains product quality.

implementation_requirements.name: Ingredient Storage System
implementation_requirements.specification: Temperature controlled, Humidity controlled, FIFO (First In, First Out)
implementation_requirements.description: Ensures ingredient freshness and minimizes spoilage.
